PropertyList.text:
_________________Startup-Procedures___________________
1. Set magneto switch to ' BOTH ' 2. Set fuel tank switch to ' Rear Tank ' 3. Engage battery switch 4. Engage fuel pump switch 5. Engage starter switch 6. Once engine is running engage alternator switch
or use only the Autostart with ' s ' and Autostop with ' Ctrl + s '
_______________________Notice_________________________ Thanks to all flightgear authors I have stolen from with eyes and fingers for this little common spruce aircraft. - Syd Adams - Anders Gidenstam - Ron Jensen - Torsten Dreyer - Stuart Buchanan - Frank Goeldner - PAF Team - Clement de l'Hamaide - Emmanuel Barranger - Maik Justus - Lee Elliott - Yurik V. Nikiforoff - Enrique Laso - Alexis Bory
For paintings, ideas and motivation thanks to: - Michat - Antonio - Michael
